body:
This is really good, and I don't like netorare
This has in some parts the vibes of a Manara story
Story is confusing, makes the sex even more confusing
This originally has 219 pages, so only 77 more pages to be translated. i think i'll start reading this work once it's fully translated all the way to the end.
Game Theory: “does Árisa is sp00ky witch”? For real though. These authors must’ve been ultra mega cuck’d to think up a story like this. I miss the Nomus...
